message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR 

The paper deals with text recognition using deep neural networks, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The use of language models for verification also suggests a connection to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper involves searching for the best possible combination of hypotheses, which could be considered a form of information retrieval (cs.IR).
